rosegold.information: The beautifully crafted rose gold mesh strap is soft and lightweight, and ensures the watch sits comfortably on your wrist.

silver.information: The beautifully crafted silver mesh strap is soft and lightweight, and ensures the watch sits comfortably on your wrist.

black.information: The beautifully crafted matte black mesh strap is soft and lightweight, and ensures the watch sits comfortably on your wrist.
